fails:ENV.filter! removes environment variables for which the block returns true
fails:ENV.filter! returns self if any changes were made
fails:ENV.filter! returns nil if no changes were made
fails:ENV.filter! returns an Enumerator if called without a block
fails:ENV.filter! when no block is given returned Enumerator size returns the enumerable size
fails:ENV.filter returns a Hash of names and values for which block return true
fails:ENV.filter returns an Enumerator when no block is given
fails:ENV.filter when no block is given returned Enumerator size returns the enumerable size
